content:
# I successfully crafted 1 iron gear wheel. The updated inventory now reflects:
# - 4 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 5 iron plates
# - 3 copper plates
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 2 electronic circuits

# With the current resources, I can now craft the Assembling Machine since I have:
# - 2 electronic circuits
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 1 transport belt
# - 5 iron plates

# I will now proceed to craft the Assembling Machine.

craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1)  # Craft 1 Assembling Machine.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting the Assembling Machine. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
